DOC.brief_summary: Acute kidney injury (AKI) is a common clinical syndrome, especially patients in the hospital. AKI has become a huge medical burden in China. Little information is available about this disease burden in our country. The investigators aimed to evaluate the burden of AKI and to analyze the related risk factors.
DOC.brief_title: China Collaborative Study on Epidemiology of Acute Kidney Injury
DOC.detailed_description: The investigators launch a nationwide of all patients, who were admitted to hospital from 2011-2016. Patients were diagnosed on the basis of changes in serum creatinine by the laboratory information system. The investigators assessed rates of AKI according to the criteria of 2012 Kidney Disease Improving Global Outcomes (KDIGO).
